rules_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact or creature.
Target player draws two cards. Teach up to one target creature lifelink. [i](Put a lifelink counter on it. If it already has lifelink, put a +1/+1 counter on it instead.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]“Uuh... Yeah, totally meant to do that.”[/i]
